DOCNAME: CASE OF PETKOVA AND OTHERS v. BULGARIA
CONCLUSION: Violation of Article 1 of Protocol No. 1 - Protection of property (Article 1 para. 1 of Protocol No. 1 - Peaceful enjoyment of possessions)
TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicant , PERSON , was born in DATE and lives in GPE . She was represented before the ORG by Mr PERSON Ekimdzhiev and Ms K. GPE , lawyers practising in GPE .
